document.full_text: egypt's muslim brotherhood said on monday that u.s. soldiers should be withdrawn from afghanistan and iraq after the killing of osama bin laden, the mastermind of the september 11 attacks that led to two u.s.-led wars.
document.title: brotherhood: u.s. troops should now quit iraq, afghan
lines_and_colors: egypt's muslim brotherhood said on monday that u.s. soldiers should be withdrawn from afghanistan and iraq after the killing of osama bin laden, the mastermind of the september 11 attacks that led to two u.s.-led wars.
